review: It works great,it keeps my music in order.I am able to see my music.This has been a very useful tool.
Works great, just what I needed to have to walk all over the room. Now I sit in my chair
This device has really help me. I am new at trying to learn. I have a long way to go.
I needed to have a place to sit my guitars and bass. These things work really great. I love them.
I wanted to put a strap on my acoustic guitar. Now it is easier to handle, when trying to play.
I needed picks, so I ordered an assortment. I have been trying different ones. I seem to like them all.
